com.orsoncharts.marker

Class RangeMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orsoncharts.marker.AbstractMarker
      • com.orsoncharts.marker.RangeMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartElement, Marker, MarkerChangeListener, ValueMarker, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class RangeMarker
extends AbstractMarker
implements ValueMarker, MarkerChangeListener, java.io.Serializable
    A marker that marks a range of values on an axis.

    For an example, please refer to the demo RangeMarkerDemo1.java.

    NOTE: This class is serializable, but the serialization format is subject to change in future releases and should not be relied upon for persisting instances of this class.
    Since:
    1.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setLabel(java.lang.String label)
